com.xekri.leakvm.sdk.utils

Class ContextUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xekri.leakvm.sdk.utils.ContextUtils

  • public final class ContextUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    ContextUtils is an utility class to gets Context useful elements.
